results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/50]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The France Australia Rugby Match - France wins 18 to 9. The Parc des Princes - Paris’ new stadium nearing completion. Helping the builders - mammoth exhibition of building materials. 2. Insects and men - study of insects at the Antibes agronomy laboratory. 3. Abel Gance - one of France’s major movie directors. 4. The arts: Balthus - sketches by Balthus. Naum Gabo - sculptures and dynamic structures.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/48]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Charlie Chaplin - revival of Chaplin’s pictures in Paris. results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/47]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The 25th anniversary of UNESCO - President Pompidou at the 25th anniversary celebrations. French liqueurs - international press tour the large French Liqueur distilleries. Homage to a conductor - former French operatic conductor Henri Buser will soon be 100 years old. 2. The fight against pollution - the Plant Biology laboratory of the Grenoble Nuclear Research Center. 3. Stamps for General de Gaulle - a commemorative issue on the eve of de Gaulle’s death anniversary. 4. Paul Valery - at the French National Library, an exhibition on the occasion of the centenary of French poet, Paul Valery’s birth.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/45]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Fire fighting demonstration. 2. Fight against pollution in Paris with air cleaning towers. 3. 2nd phase of SP3000 oceanic sea saucer for observation and underwater photography. 4. Clock making exhibition from 15th century until 1971 plus factory tour showing techniques and most recently, quartz watches. 5. Paris biennial art show for under 35’s. 6. Homage to Picasso who is 90 in his home town and in the Louvre. President Pompidou and his wife open exhibition of some of Picasso’s paintings.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Light fixture designing - an exhibition of the Pavillon de Marsan in the Louvre. Jousting Lyon style - French waterjousting championships. Comic strips - 3rd International Convention. 2. The Inter-Parliamentary Union - 59th annual conference in Paris and Versailles. 3. The Iron Age at the Saint-Germain Museum - new rooms for the antiquities and the Iron Age of ancient Gaul. 4. Concert at Thoiry Park - Jean-Baptiste Lully’s works played at Thoiry Zoo.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Holiday flashes: Leisure at last - vacation colonies for children. results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/31]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The passing scene: “Mediterranean Art” - re-opening of the antique arts rooms at the Louvre; “The Windmills of Paris” - motionless sails of a recent past. 2. Electricity and measurements - ONERA metrology. 3. Baccarat - the Lorraine village of Bacccarat is known especially for its crystal-ware of the same name. 4. Art Crafts House - the Paris Art Crafts House, on the fringe of the Latin Quarter, on the left Bank.
